name: Platforming Around Space Time
description:
The universe has been fractured apart and the space time continuum no longer flows like it used to. Navigate around on the bending planes of the reality to collect the time fractals and repair the universe.

This game plays like a regular platformer with movement and jumping:

  • Movement: [a], [d] on keyboard or left joystick on controller
  • Jump: [space] on keyboard or Y on controller

Credits:

I used the platformer character controller from Tarodev https://github.com/Matthew-J-Spencer/Ultimate-2D-Controller

I used music from Eric Matyas https://soundimage.org/sci-fi/

And sound effects from https://pixabay.com/
